TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class AutoFieldsGenerator : System.Web.UI.IAutoFieldGenerator, System.Web.UI.IStateManager
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AutoFieldsGenerator extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IAutoFieldGenerator, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager

Docs.summary: Represents a base class for classes that automatically generate fields for data-bound controls that use ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Returns a list of the properties of an object.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether enumeration fields should be generated by this instance.
Docs.value: if fields should be generated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If this flag is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator> instance uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class to determine the default behavior. In that case, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator.AutoGenerateEnumFields%2A> is set to `true` when <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> represents version 4.5 or later, and `false` in older versions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField CreateAutoGeneratedFieldFromFieldProperties(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties fieldProperties) cil managed

Docs.param: The list of properties to use when creating the field.
Docs.summary: Creates one or more autogenerated fields using the specified collection of field properties.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method sets the header text and sort expression of the field to the `Name` value of `fieldProperties`, sets the `ReadOnly` property of the field to the `IsReadOnly` value of `fieldProperties`, and sets the `DataType` property of the field to the Type value of `fieldProperties`.
This method can be overridden to create a different field.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Collections.Generic.List<System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField> CreateAutoGeneratedFields (object dataItem, System.Web.UI.Control control);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField> CreateAutoGeneratedFields(object dataItem, class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed

Docs.param: The data-bound control that will contain the autogenerated fields.
Docs.summary: When implemented in a derived class, creates autogenerated fields based on the current data item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method typically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties%2A> collection.

Docs.param: The data-bound control that will contain the autogenerated fields.
Docs.summary: Creates objects based on metadata information for the table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method can be overridden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
